statements: DELETE FROM SustainableDevelopment WHERE development_name = 'Solar Farm';
DELETE FROM EnvironmentalAssessment WHERE assessment_id = 100 AND assessment_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM SustainableDevelopment WHERE development_id = 200 AND development_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM assessment_results WHERE assessment_id = 3 AND impact_score > 50;
DELETE FROM assessment_results WHERE assessment_id = 123 AND impact_score < 50;
DELETE FROM land_use_data WHERE land_type = 'Agricultural Land' AND land_area > 100;
DELETE FROM sustainable_practices WHERE description LIKE '%sustainable%' AND success_rate < 0.5;
DELETE FROM assessment_land_relationship WHERE assessment_id = 1 AND land_id = 2;
